command_descriptions.8ball: Predicts the answer to a question
command_descriptions.afk: Display AFK message for users when tagged
command_descriptions.alert: Allows members to message the admins
command_descriptions.appstore: Searches the Apple App Store for one or more apps
command_descriptions.archive: Provides a JSON file with the last n messages in chat
command_descriptions.ban: Removes a member from the server and prevents them from coming back
command_descriptions.chatterbot: The Mitsuku chatbot, very fun and friendly
command_descriptions.choose: Randomly chooses from a set of options
command_descriptions.convert: Converts between units of measurement and currencies
command_descriptions.cool: Sets a command cooldown for the channel
command_descriptions.countdown: Set a timer for an event
command_descriptions.emoji: Fetches the large version of an emoji
command_descriptions.games: Command that shows the most-played games by members on the server
command_descriptions.gif: Gets a GIF from Giphy with the given tags
command_descriptions.giveaway: Easy way to randomly give away a secret of some sort
command_descriptions.google: Displays Google search and Knowledge Graph results
command_descriptions.image: Searches Google Images with the given query and returns the first or a random result
command_descriptions.imdb: Provides movie and TV show data
command_descriptions.info: Lists basic stats about this server
command_descriptions.join: Provdes the OAuth link to add the bot to another server
command_descriptions.kick: Removes a member from the server
command_descriptions.linkme: Searches the Google Play Store for one or more apps
command_descriptions.lottery: Hourly point giveaways in the points command
command_descriptions.messages: Command that shows the top members on the server by activity
command_descriptions.music: Plays audio from YouTube in a voice channel
command_descriptions.mute: Prevents users from sending messages in a channel
command_descriptions.nuke: Deletes messages in a channel, all or from a user
command_descriptions.perms: Modifies permissions for a role or user in a channel
command_descriptions.pokedex: Searches Pokemon database by Pokedex number
command_descriptions.poll: Allows users to create live, in-chat polls
command_descriptions.profile: An all-in-one command to view information about users
command_descriptions.quiet: Turns off the bot in one or all channels
command_descriptions.ranks: Lists the ranks of all members of the server
command_descriptions.reddit: Gets the top HOT posts from a given sub on Reddit
command_descriptions.roll: Generates a random number or rolls a die
command_descriptions.room: Allows anyone to create a temporary channel with a few other members
command_descriptions.rss: Fetches entries from an RSS feed
command_descriptions.shorten: Uses goo.gl to shorten or decode a URL
command_descriptions.stats: Collect data about the most active members and most popular games and commands on the server for each week
command_descriptions.stock: Fetches basic information about a stock symbol from Yahoo! Finance
command_descriptions.time: Gets the time in a city or country
command_descriptions.translate: Uses Microsoft Translate to translate a word/phrase into another language
command_descriptions.trivia: A fun question-and-answer group quiz game
command_descriptions.twitter: Fetches the Twitter timeline for a given user
command_descriptions.urban: Defines the given word from Urban Dictionary
command_descriptions.weather: Gets th current weather and forecast for the given location from MSN Weather
command_descriptions.wiki: Shows the first three paragraphs of the Wikipedia article matching the given search query
command_descriptions.wolfram: Displays an entire Wolfram|Alpha knowledge page about a given topic or person
command_descriptions.xkcd: Fetches today's XKCD comic or by ID
command_descriptions.youtube: Gets a YouTube link with the given query, including channels, videos, and playlists
